PurchaserPlanAssn.name: PurchaserPlanAssn
PurchaserPlanAssn.description: Represents a junction object that associates the purchaser to the plans they offer to members.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this purchaser to purchaser plan association.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PurchaserId.description: The ID of the plan purchaser’s Account object record.

PurchaserPlanId.description: The ID of the associated plan on the Purchaser Plan object.

Role.description: Indicates whether the purchaser plays a primary or secondary role in the plan.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this item was last changed on the source system.

Status.description: Indicates whether this purchaser plan relationship is active.
